citation.article-title: Proposals to unify the genera Bartonella and Rochalimaea, with descriptions of Bartonella quintana comb. nov., Bartonella vinsonii comb. nov., Bartonella henselae comb. nov., and Bartonella elizabethae comb. nov., and to remove the family Bartonellaceae from the order Rickettsiales.

p.s: Emendation of the family Rickettsiaceae (Pinkerton 1936) Weiss and Moulder 1984.

It is proposed that the genus Rochalimaea should be removed from the family Rickettsiaceae. This requires emending the description of the Rickettsiaceae to exclude organisms that are cultivable in cellfree media.
